name: decaddci2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: decaddci(c0, c1, c2, nat0, c3, c4)
stmt.pretty: decaddci(c0, c1, c2, nat0, c3, c4)

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdc(c2, nat0))
-| wcel(c3, cn0)

-| wceq(c0, cdc(c3, c4))
-| wceq(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c2)
-| wcel(nat0, cn0)
-| wceq(co(c4, caddc, c1), cdc(nat1, nat0))

-| wcel(nat0, cn0)

|- wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdc(c2, nat0))

comment: Add two numerals ` M ` and ` N ` (no carry). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.) (Revised by AV, 6-Sep-2021.)
